= viz =

== Format ==
cg viz tsvfile

== Summary ==
grahical vizualization of tsv file (even very large ones) as table without loading everything into memory

== Description ==
Shows the given tsv table in a gui. It indexes the table rather than loading
it entirely into memory. This means it can be used to browse huge tables very fast.
It only takes waiting time on first access (making the indexes)
Queries and vizualzations will be added later

== Arguments ==
; **tsvfile** ...: tsvfile to display

== Category ==
tsv
